عرض تفاصيل سمة

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/attribute/1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"

    "http://localhost/api/attribute/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Show headers

}

تحديث بيانات وقيم سمة

Example request:
curl --request PUT \
    "http://localhost/api/attribute/1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"name\": \"ywahunhbj\",
    \"value\": \"gsedfdhwwkdwdjqblukqmnbj\",
    \"company_id\": \"ut\",
    \"created_by\": \"occaecati\"
}"

    "http://localhost/api/attribute/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

    "name": "ywahunhbj",
    "value": "gsedfdhwwkdwdjqblukqmnbj",
    "company_id": "ut",
    "created_by": "occaecati"
};

    method: "PUT",
    headers,

}).then(response => response.json());

إضافة متغير لمنتج إنشاء تشكيلة جديدة (مثلاً لون أو مقاس معين) لمنتج موجود مسبقاً.

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://localhost/api/product-variant" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"barcode\": \"culpa\",
    \"sku\": \"APP-IPHN15-RED\",
    \"retail_price\": 1200,
    \"wholesale_price\": 1,
    \"profit_margin\": 9,
    \"image\": \"a\",
    \"weight\": 23,
    \"dimensions\": \"ldsolgzinfbszjmavn\",
    \"tax\": 8,
    \"discount\": 16,
    \"status\": \"discontinued\",
    \"product_id\": 1,
    \"company_id\": \"voluptatum\",
    \"created_by\": \"eos\"
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/product-variant"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "barcode": "culpa",
    "sku": "APP-IPHN15-RED",
    "retail_price": 1200,
    "wholesale_price": 1,
    "profit_margin": 9,
    "image": "a",
    "weight": 23,
    "dimensions": "ldsolgzinfbszjmavn",
    "tax": 8,
    "discount": 16,
    "status": "discontinued",
    "product_id": 1,
    "company_id": "voluptatum",
    "created_by": "eos"
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/product-variant

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

barcode   string  optional  

Example: culpa

sku   string  optional  

رمز SKU الفريد. Example: APP-IPHN15-RED

retail_price   number  optional  

سعر البيع. Example: 1200

wholesale_price   number  optional  

Must be at least 0. Example: 1

profit_margin   number  optional  

Must be at least 0. Must not be greater than 100. Example: 9

image   string  optional  

Must not be greater than 255 characters. Example: a

weight   number  optional  

Must be at least 0. Example: 23

dimensions   string  optional  

Must not be greater than 255 characters. Example: ldsolgzinfbszjmavn

tax   number  optional  

Must be at least 0. Must not be greater than 100. Example: 8

discount   number  optional  

Must be at least 0. Example: 16

status   string   

Example: discontinued

Must be one of:
  • active
  • inactive
  • discontinued
product_id   integer   

معرف المنتج الأم. Example: 1

company_id   string   

The id of an existing record in the companies table. Example: voluptatum

created_by   string   

The id of an existing record in the users table. Example: eos

عرض متغير محدد جلب تفاصيل تشكيلة معينة شاملة المخزون والخصائص الفنية.

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/product-variant/1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/product-variant/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (401):

Show headers 
cache-control: no-cache, private
content-type: application/json
access-control-allow-origin: *
 

{
    "message": "Unauthenticated."
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

تحديث متغير

Example request:
curl --request PUT \
    "http://localhost/api/product-variant/1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"product_id\": \"nisi\",
    \"barcode\": \"kearhtrmulanidgmo\",
    \"sku\": \"pppwingvmvxkwgcxcsykjmgri\",
    \"retail_price\": 38,
    \"wholesale_price\": 20,
    \"profit_margin\": 22,
    \"image\": \"dhpfdkqojlnef\",
    \"weight\": 79,
    \"dimensions\": \"yidqkdudb\",
    \"tax\": 25,
    \"discount\": 85,
    \"status\": \"inactive\"
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/product-variant/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "product_id": "nisi",
    "barcode": "kearhtrmulanidgmo",
    "sku": "pppwingvmvxkwgcxcsykjmgri",
    "retail_price": 38,
    "wholesale_price": 20,
    "profit_margin": 22,
    "image": "dhpfdkqojlnef",
    "weight": 79,
    "dimensions": "yidqkdudb",
    "tax": 25,
    "discount": 85,
    "status": "inactive"
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "PUT",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.

Request      

PUT api/product-variant/{productVariant}

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

productVariant   integer   

Example: 1

Body Parameters

product_id   string   

The id of an existing record in the products table. Example: nisi

company_id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the companies table.

created_by   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the users table.

barcode   string  optional  

Must not be greater than 255 characters. Example: kearhtrmulanidgmo

sku   string  optional  

Must not be greater than 255 characters. Example: pppwingvmvxkwgcxcsykjmgri

retail_price   number  optional  

Must be at least 0. Example: 38

wholesale_price   number  optional  

Must be at least 0. Example: 20

profit_margin   number  optional  

Must be at least 0. Must not be greater than 100. Example: 22

image   string  optional  

Must not be greater than 255 characters. Example: dhpfdkqojlnef

weight   number  optional  

Must be at least 0. Example: 79

dimensions   string  optional  

Must not be greater than 255 characters. Example: yidqkdudb

tax   number  optional  

Must be at least 0. Must not be greater than 100. Example: 25

discount   number  optional  

Must be at least 0. Example: 85

status   string  optional  

Example: inactive

Must be one of:
  • active
  • inactive
  • discontinued

حذف متغير

    --header "Accept: application/json"

    "http://localhost/api/product-variant/delete" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"ids\": [
        1,
        2,
        5
    ]
}"

    "http://localhost/api/product-variant/delete"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "ids": [
        1,
        2,
        5
    ]
};

    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());

Body Parameters

ids   string[]   

مصفوفة المعرفات المطلوب حذفها.

بحث متقدم في التشكيلات

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/product-variants/search-by-product?search=officiis" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/product-variants/search-by-product"
);

const params = {
    "search": "officiis",
};
Object.keys(params)
    .forEach(key => url.searchParams.append(key, params[key]));

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (401):

Show headers 
cache-control: no-cache, private
content-type: application/json
access-control-allow-origin: *
 

{
    "message": "Unauthenticated."
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/product-variants/search-by-product

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Query Parameters

search   string  optional  

نص البحث. Example: officiis

إنشاء مستودع جديد

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://localhost/api/warehouse" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"name\": \"مستودع جدة\",
    \"location\": \"kuhzhrgnbokwudmptbsrtt\",
    \"manager\": \"kvcevunmnmtjvftttlx\",
    \"capacity\": 55,
    \"status\": \"inactive\",
    \"company_id\": 1,
    \"address\": \"شارع فلسطين\",
    \"active\": true
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/warehouse"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "name": "مستودع جدة",
    "location": "kuhzhrgnbokwudmptbsrtt",
    "manager": "kvcevunmnmtjvftttlx",
    "capacity": 55,
    "status": "inactive",
    "company_id": 1,
    "address": "شارع فلسطين",
    "active": true
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/warehouse

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

name   string   

اسم المستودع. Example: مستودع جدة

location   string  optional  

Must not be greater than 255 characters. Example: kuhzhrgnbokwudmptbsrtt

manager   string  optional  

Must not be greater than 255 characters. Example: kvcevunmnmtjvftttlx

capacity   integer  optional  

Must be at least 0. Example: 55

status   string  optional  

Example: inactive

Must be one of:
  • active
  • inactive
company_id   integer  optional  

معرف الشركة (للمسؤول العام فقط). Example: 1

created_by   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the users table.

address   string  optional  

عنوان المستودع. Example: شارع فلسطين

active   boolean  optional  

حالة المستودع. Example: true

عرض تفاصيل مستودع

curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/warehouse/1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"

    "http://localhost/api/warehouse/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Show headers

content-type: application/json
access-control-allow-origin: *
 

{
    "message": "Unauthenticated."
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Example request:
curl --request PUT \
    "http://localhost/api/warehouse/1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"name\": \"مستودع جدة الجديد\",
    \"location\": \"cgmzeqpqgtmdhh\",
    \"manager\": \"swtbv\",
    \"capacity\": 39,
    \"status\": \"inactive\",
    \"company_id\": 2,
    \"created_by\": \"quibusdam\",
    \"address\": \"شارع فلسطين، حي الجامعة\",
    \"active\": false
}"

    "http://localhost/api/warehouse/1"
);

    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://localhost/api/stock" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"quantity\": 50,
    \"reserved\": 34,
    \"min_quantity\": 9,
    \"cost\": 37,
    \"batch\": \"erwkhqibufvaeuqptgxdo\",
    \"expiry\": \"2026-01-01T20:56:00\",
    \"loc\": \"iuddquysbsreqlikrvyvk\",
    \"status\": \"in\",
    \"variant_id\": \"provident\",
    \"warehouse_id\": 1,
    \"company_id\": \"voluptatem\",
    \"created_by\": \"vitae\",
    \"product_variant_id\": 1,
    \"notes\": \"رصيد افتتاحي\"
}"

    "http://localhost/api/stock"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

    "quantity": 50,
    "reserved": 34,
    "min_quantity": 9,
    "cost": 37,
    "batch": "erwkhqibufvaeuqptgxdo",
    "expiry": "2026-01-01T20:56:00",
    "loc": "iuddquysbsreqlikrvyvk",
    "status": "in",
    "variant_id": "provident",

    "company_id": "voluptatem",

Request      

POST api/stock

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

quantity   number   

الكمية. Example: 50

reserved   integer  optional  

Must be at least 0. Example: 34

min_quantity   integer  optional  

Must be at least 0. Example: 9

cost   number  optional  

Must be at least 0. Example: 37

batch   string  optional  

Must not be greater than 255 characters. Example: erwkhqibufvaeuqptgxdo

expiry   string  optional  

Must be a valid date. Example: 2026-01-01T20:56:00

loc   string  optional  

Must not be greater than 255 characters. Example: iuddquysbsreqlikrvyvk

status   string   

الحالة (in/out). Example: in

variant_id   string   

The id of an existing record in the product_variants table. Example: provident

warehouse_id   integer   

معرف المستودع. Example: 1

company_id   string   

The id of an existing record in the companies table. Example: voluptatem

created_by   string   

The id of an existing record in the users table. Example: vitae

product_variant_id   integer   

معرف متغير المنتج. Example: 1

notes   string  optional  

ملاحظات إضافية. Example: رصيد افتتاحي

عرض تفاصيل حركة مخزون

    --get "http://localhost/api/stock/1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"

    "http://localhost/api/stock/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

تحديث حركة مخزون

Example request:
curl --request PUT \
    "http://localhost/api/stock/1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"quantity\": 50,
    \"reserved\": 49,
    \"min_quantity\": 24,
    \"cost\": 65,
    \"batch\": \"hbxwxfiawpu\",
    \"expiry\": \"2026-01-01T20:56:00\",
    \"loc\": \"u\",
    \"status\": \"in\",
    \"variant_id\": \"voluptatem\",
    \"warehouse_id\": 1,
    \"company_id\": \"et\",
    \"updated_by\": \"ut\",
    \"product_variant_id\": 1,
    \"notes\": \"تحديث الرصيد\"
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/stock/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "quantity": 50,
    "reserved": 49,
    "min_quantity": 24,
    "cost": 65,
    "batch": "hbxwxfiawpu",
    "expiry": "2026-01-01T20:56:00",
    "loc": "u",
    "status": "in",
    "variant_id": "voluptatem",
    "warehouse_id": 1,
    "company_id": "et",
    "updated_by": "ut",
    "product_variant_id": 1,
    "notes": "تحديث الرصيد"
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "PUT",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());

    "http://localhost/api/stock/delete" \

    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

    --get "http://localhost/api/category/1" \

    --header "Accept: application/json"

    "http://localhost/api/category/1"
);

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

category   integer   

The category. Example: 1

تحديث بيانات قسم

Example request:
curl --request PUT \
    "http://localhost/api/category/1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"name\": \"ztdndbgpiwuxxsahbh\",
    \"description\": \"Ea vel consequatur consequatur id expedita in.\"
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/category/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "name": "ztdndbgpiwuxxsahbh",
    "description": "Ea vel consequatur consequatur id expedita in."
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "PUT",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

PUT api/category/{category}

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

category   integer   

The category. Example: 1

Body Parameters

name   string   

Must not be greater than 255 characters. Example: ztdndbgpiwuxxsahbh

description   string  optional  

Example: Ea vel consequatur consequatur id expedita in.

parent_id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the categories table.

company_id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the companies table.

created_by   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the users table.

Example request:

    "http://localhost/api/brand" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"name\": \"آبل\",
    \"description\": \"Eos quas ad adipisci officiis.\",
    \"desc\": \"شركة تقنية عالمية\"
}"

    "http://localhost/api/brand"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

    "name": "آبل",
    "description": "Eos quas ad adipisci officiis.",
    "desc": "شركة تقنية عالمية"
};

    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

The id of an existing record in the companies table.

The id of an existing record in the users table.

description   string  optional  

Example: Eos quas ad adipisci officiis.

05. إدراة المستخدمين

إنشاء دور جديد

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://localhost/api/role" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"name\": \"Accountant\",
    \"company_ids\": [
        1
    ],
    \"permissions\": [
        \"users.view\",
        \"invoices.create\"
    ]
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/role"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "name": "Accountant",
    "company_ids": [
        1
    ],
    "permissions": [
        "users.view",
        "invoices.create"
    ]
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/role

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

name   string   

اسم الدور الفريد. Example: Accountant

company_ids   integer[]  optional  

مصفوفة الشركات المرتبطة.

permissions   string[]  optional  

مصفوفة مسميات الصلاحيات.

عرض تفاصيل دور

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/role/1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/role/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (401):

Show headers 
cache-control: no-cache, private
content-type: application/json
access-control-allow-origin: *
 

{
    "message": "Unauthenticated."
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

    "http://localhost/api/role/1" \

    \"name\": \"Senior Accountant\",
    \"permissions\": [
        \"invoices.all\"
    ]

حذف أدوار (Batch Delete)

Example request:
curl --request DELETE \
    "http://localhost/api/role/1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"item_ids\": [
        2,
        3
    ]
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/role/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "item_ids": [
        2,
        3
    ]
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "DELETE",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

role   integer   

The role. Example: 1

Body Parameters

item_ids   integer[]   

مصفوفة معرفات الأدوار.

تعيين أدوار لمستخدم

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://localhost/api/role/assignRole" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"user_id\": 1,
    \"roles\": [
        \"admin\",
        \"editor\"
    ]
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/role/assignRole"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "user_id": 1,
    "roles": [
        "admin",
        "editor"
    ]
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/role/assignRole

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

user_id   integer   

معرف المستخدم. Example: 1

roles   string[]   

مصفوفة مسميات الأدوار.

05. التقارير المالية

تقرير الأرباح والخسائر (P&L) حساب إجمالي الإيرادات مقابل التكاليف لاستخراج صافي الربح.

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/reports/profit-loss?date_from=2023-10-01&date_to=2023-10-31&company_id=19" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/reports/profit-loss"
);

const params = {
    "date_from": "2023-10-01",
    "date_to": "2023-10-31",
    "company_id": "19",
};
Object.keys(params)
    .forEach(key => url.searchParams.append(key, params[key]));

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (401):

Show headers 
cache-control: no-cache, private
content-type: application/json
access-control-allow-origin: *
 

{
    "message": "Unauthenticated."
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/reports/profit-loss

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Query Parameters

date_from   string  optional  

date تاريخ البداية. Example: 2023-10-01

date_to   string  optional  

date تاريخ النهاية. Example: 2023-10-31

company_id   integer  optional  

معرف الشركة. Example: 19

مقارنة شهرية للأرباح

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/reports/profit-loss/monthly-comparison?months=12" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/reports/profit-loss/monthly-comparison"
);

const params = {
    "months": "12",
};
Object.keys(params)
    .forEach(key => url.searchParams.append(key, params[key]));

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (401):

Show headers 
cache-control: no-cache, private
content-type: application/json
access-control-allow-origin: *
 

{
    "message": "Unauthenticated."
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/reports/profit-loss/monthly-comparison

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Query Parameters

months   integer  optional  

عدد الأشهر للمقارنة. Default: 6. Example: 12

تقرير التدفق النقدي تحليل الحركات المالية (إيداعات وسحوبات) خلال فترة زمنية محددة.

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/reports/cash-flow?date_from=2023-10-01&date_to=2023-10-31&company_id=15" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/reports/cash-flow"
);

const params = {
    "date_from": "2023-10-01",
    "date_to": "2023-10-31",
    "company_id": "15",
};
Object.keys(params)
    .forEach(key => url.searchParams.append(key, params[key]));

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (401):

Show headers 
cache-control: no-cache, private
content-type: application/json
access-control-allow-origin: *
 

{
    "message": "Unauthenticated."
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/reports/cash-flow

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Query Parameters

date_from   string  optional  

date تاريخ البداية. Example: 2023-10-01

date_to   string  optional  

date تاريخ النهاية. Example: 2023-10-31

company_id   integer  optional  

معرف الشركة. Example: 15

التدفق النقدي حسب الخزنة

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/reports/cash-flow/by-cash-box?date_from=2023-10-01&date_to=2023-10-31" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"

    "http://localhost/api/reports/cash-flow/by-cash-box"
);

const params = {
    "date_from": "2023-10-01",
    "date_to": "2023-10-31",
};
Object.keys(params)
    .forEach(key => url.searchParams.append(key, params[key]));

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (401):

Show headers 
cache-control: no-cache, private
content-type: application/json
access-control-allow-origin: *
 

{
    "message": "Unauthenticated."
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Query Parameters

date تاريخ البداية. Example: 2023-10-01

date تاريخ النهاية. Example: 2023-10-31

ملخص السيولة الحالية عرض أرصدة جميع الخزن وتصنيفاتها.

    --get "http://localhost/api/reports/cash-flow/summary?company_id=12" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"

    "http://localhost/api/reports/cash-flow/summary"
);

    .forEach(key => url.searchParams.append(key, params[key]));

    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

    "message": "Unauthenticated."

company_id   integer  optional

05. التقارير والتحليلات

تقرير المبيعات العام توليد تقرير شامل للمبيعات مع إمكانية التجميع حسب (اليوم، الشهر، العميل، أو المنتج).

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/reports/sales?date_from=2024-01-01&date_to=praesentium&group_by=month&export=et" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/reports/sales"
);

const params = {
    "date_from": "2024-01-01",
    "date_to": "praesentium",
    "group_by": "month",
    "export": "et",
};
Object.keys(params)
    .forEach(key => url.searchParams.append(key, params[key]));

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (401):

Show headers 
cache-control: no-cache, private
content-type: application/json
access-control-allow-origin: *
 

{
    "message": "Unauthenticated."
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/reports/sales

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Query Parameters

date_from   string  optional  

date تاريخ البداية. Example: 2024-01-01

date_to   string  optional  

date تاريخ النهاية. Example: praesentium

group_by   string  optional  

التجميع حسب (day, month, product, customer). Example: month

export   string  optional  

تصدير التقرير (excel, csv). Example: et

المنتجات الأكثر مبيعاً عرض قائمة بالمنتجات الأعلى مبيعاً خلال فترة محددة.

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/reports/sales/top-products?limit=10" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/reports/sales/top-products"
);

const params = {
    "limit": "10",
};
Object.keys(params)
    .forEach(key => url.searchParams.append(key, params[key]));

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (401):

Show headers 
cache-control: no-cache, private
content-type: application/json
access-control-allow-origin: *
 

{
    "message": "Unauthenticated."
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/reports/sales/top-products

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Query Parameters

limit   integer  optional  

عدد النتائج. Example: 10

كبار العملاء عرض قائمة بالعملاء الأكثر شراءً.

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/reports/sales/top-customers" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/reports/sales/top-customers"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (401):

Show headers

access-control-allow-origin: *
 

{
    "message": "Unauthenticated."

Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/reports/sales/top-customers

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

اتجاهات المبيعات (Trend) تحليل حركة المبيعات بمرور الوقت (يومياً، أسبوعياً، أو شهرياً).

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/reports/sales/trend?period=week" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/reports/sales/trend"
);

    "period": "week",
};

    .forEach(key => url.searchParams.append(key, params[key]));

    "Content-Type": "application/json",

    method: "GET",

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Query Parameters

period   string  optional  

نوع الفترة (day, week, month). Example: week

حركة المخزون تقرير مفصل عن عمليات الوارد والمنصرف لكل منتج ومستودع.

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/reports/stock?product_id=12&date_from=laborum" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"

    "http://localhost/api/reports/stock"
);

    "product_id": "12",
    "date_from": "laborum",
};

    .forEach(key => url.searchParams.append(key, params[key]));

    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Show headers

access-control-allow-origin: *
 

{
    "message": "Unauthenticated."

Request failed with error:

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Query Parameters

فلترة حسب المنتج. Example: 12

date_from   string  optional  

date تاريخ البداية. Example: laborum

تقييم المخزون حساب القيمة المالية للمخزون الحالي بناءً على سعر التكلفة وسعر البيع.

    --get "http://localhost/api/reports/stock/valuation" \

تنبيهات نقص المخزون عرض المنتجات التي وصلت كميتها إلى حد أقل من القيمة المحددة.

    --get "http://localhost/api/reports/stock/low-stock?threshold=10" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"

    "http://localhost/api/reports/stock/low-stock"

الحد الأدنى للكمية. Example: 10

المنتجات الراكدة المنتجات التي لم يتم عليها أي حركة خلال فترة طويلة.

ملخص الضريبة ملخص للضرائب المحصلة والمدفوعة وصافي الالتزام الضريبي.

curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/reports/tax?date_from=2023-10-01&date_to=aut" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"

    "http://localhost/api/reports/tax"
);

    "date_from": "2023-10-01",
    "date_to": "aut",

    .forEach(key => url.searchParams.append(key, params[key]));

    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

مؤشرات لوحة التحكم (Dashboard) جلب الإحصائيات الحيوية للنظام (إجمالي المبيعات، نمو العملاء، المنتجات الأعلى مبيعاً) لعرضها في الشاشة الرئيسية.

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/dashboard/summary" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/dashboard/summary"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (401):

Show headers 
cache-control: no-cache, private
content-type: application/json
access-control-allow-origin: *
 

{
    "message": "Unauthenticated."
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/dashboard/summary

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

06. العمليات المالية والخزينة

تحويل الرصيد (Transfer) إجراء عملية تحويل رصيد من صندوق مستخدم إلى صندوق مستخدم آخر أو لنفس المستخدم في صندوق آخر.

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://localhost/api/transfer" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"target_user_id\": 2,
    \"amount\": 100,
    \"from_cash_box_id\": 1,
    \"to_cash_box_id\": 2,
    \"description\": \"تحويل داخلي\"
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/transfer"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "target_user_id": 2,
    "amount": 100,
    "from_cash_box_id": 1,
    "to_cash_box_id": 2,
    "description": "تحويل داخلي"
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/transfer

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

target_user_id   integer   

معرف المستخدم المستهدف. Example: 2

amount   number   

المبلغ. Example: 100

from_cash_box_id   integer   

معرف صندوق الصادر. Example: 1

to_cash_box_id   integer   

معرف صندوق الوارد. Example: 2

description   string  optional  

وصف المعاملة. Example: تحويل داخلي

إيداع نقدي (Deposit)

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://localhost/api/deposit" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"amount\": 1000,
    \"cash_box_id\": 1,
    \"description\": \"إيداع رأس مال\"
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/deposit"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "amount": 1000,
    "cash_box_id": 1,
    "description": "إيداع رأس مال"
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/deposit

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

amount   number   

المبلغ المودع. Example: 1000

cash_box_id   integer   

معرف الخزنة. Example: 1

description   string  optional  

وصف الإيداع. Example: إيداع رأس مال

سحب نقدي (Withdraw)

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://localhost/api/withdraw" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"amount\": 200,
    \"cash_box_id\": 1,
    \"description\": \"مصاريف نثرية\"
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/withdraw"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "amount": 200,
    "cash_box_id": 1,
    "description": "مصاريف نثرية"
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/withdraw

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

amount   number   

المبلغ المسحوب. Example: 200

cash_box_id   integer   

معرف الخزنة. Example: 1

description   string  optional  

وصف السحب. Example: مصاريف نثرية

عرض جميع المعاملات (للمدراء)

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/transactions?type=%D8%B3%D8%AD%D8%A8&user_id=1&cashbox_id=1&created_at_from=2023-01-01" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/transactions"
);

const params = {
    "type": "سحب",
    "user_id": "1",
    "cashbox_id": "1",
    "created_at_from": "2023-01-01",
};
Object.keys(params)
    .forEach(key => url.searchParams.append(key, params[key]));

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (401):

Show headers 
cache-control: no-cache, private
content-type: application/json
access-control-allow-origin: *
 

{
    "message": "Unauthenticated."
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/transactions

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Query Parameters

type   string  optional  

نوع المعاملة. Example: سحب

user_id   integer  optional  

معرف المستخدم. Example: 1

cashbox_id   integer  optional  

معرف الخزنة. Example: 1

created_at_from   string  optional  

date تاريخ من. Example: 2023-01-01

سجل عمليات المستخدم في خزنة

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/transactions/user/1?type=%D8%A5%D9%8A%D8%AF%D8%A7%D8%B9&created_at_from=2023-01-01&per_page=5" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/transactions/user/1"
);

const params = {
    "type": "إيداع",
    "created_at_from": "2023-01-01",
    "per_page": "5",
};
Object.keys(params)
    .forEach(key => url.searchParams.append(key, params[key]));

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (401):

Show headers 
cache-control: no-cache, private
content-type: application/json
access-control-allow-origin: *
 

{
    "message": "Unauthenticated."
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/transactions/user/{cashBoxId?}

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

cashBoxId   string   

معرف الخزنة. Example: 1

Query Parameters

type   string  optional  

نوع العملية (إيداع، سحب، تحويل). Example: إيداع

created_at_from   string  optional  

date تاريخ من. Example: 2023-01-01

per_page   integer  optional  

عدد النتائج. Default: 20 Example: 5

عكس معاملة (Reverse) إلغاء معاملة سابقة وإرجاع الحالة كما كانت.

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://localhost/api/transactions/eaque/reverse" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/transactions/eaque/reverse"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/transactions/{transaction}/reverse

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

transaction   string   

The transaction. Example: eaque

transactionId   string   

المعرف الفريد للمعاملة (UUID). Example: 9abc-123...

عرض أنواع الخزن استرجاع أنواع الصناديق المالية (مثل: خزنة فرعية، حساب بنكي، عهدة موظف).

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/cashBoxTypes?description=%D8%A8%D9%86%D9%83&is_default=1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/cashBoxTypes"
);

const params = {
    "description": "بنك",
    "is_default": "1",
};
Object.keys(params)
    .forEach(key => url.searchParams.append(key, params[key]));

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (200):


{
    "data": [
        {
            "id": 1,
            "name": "نقدي",
            "description": "صندوق نقدي - للاحتفاظ بالنقود السائلة",
            "is_default": false,
            "created_at": "2026-01-01 20:54:19",
            "updated_at": "2026-01-01 20:54:19"
        },
        {
            "id": 1,
            "name": "نقدي",
            "description": "صندوق نقدي - للاحتفاظ بالنقود السائلة",
            "is_default": false,
            "created_at": "2026-01-01 20:54:19",
            "updated_at": "2026-01-01 20:54:19"
        }
    ]
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

is_default   boolean  optional

إضافة نوع خزنة جديد

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://localhost/api/cashBoxType" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"description\": \"نقدي\",
    \"is_default\": false
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/cashBoxType"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "description": "نقدي",
    "is_default": false
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());

    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"item_ids\": [
        2,
        3
    ]
}"

    "http://localhost/api/cashBoxType/1"
);

    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

    "item_ids": [
        2,
        3
    ]
};

    headers,

}).then(response => response.json());

curl --request POST \
    "http://localhost/api/cashBox" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"name\": \"مكتب القاهرة\",
    \"balance\": 15,
    \"cash_box_type_id\": \"et\",
    \"is_default\": false,
    \"user_id\": 1,
    \"company_id\": 1,
    \"description\": \"Id eius omnis consequuntur aut rerum doloremque.\",
    \"account_number\": \"ACC-001\",
    \"type_box_id\": 1
}"

    "http://localhost/api/cashBox"
);

    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

    "name": "مكتب القاهرة",

    "cash_box_type_id": "et",
    "is_default": false,

    "company_id": 1,

Request      

POST api/cashBox

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

name   string   

اسم الخزنة. Example: مكتب القاهرة

balance   number  optional  

Must be at least 0. Example: 15

cash_box_type_id   string   

The id of an existing record in the cash_box_types table. Example: et

is_default   boolean  optional  

Example: false

user_id   integer  optional  

معرف المستخدم المسؤول عن الخزنة. Example: 1

company_id   integer  optional  

معرف الشركة (للمسؤول فقط). Example: 1

created_by   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the users table.

description   string  optional  

Example: Id eius omnis consequuntur aut rerum doloremque.

account_number   string  optional  

رقم الحساب المرتبط. Example: ACC-001

type_box_id   integer   

معرف جود النوع. Example: 1

تحديث بيانات خزنة

Example request:
curl --request PUT \
    "http://localhost/api/cashBox/15" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"name\": \"الخزنة الفرعية\",
    \"balance\": 27,
    \"cash_box_type_id\": \"fugit\",
    \"is_default\": true,
    \"user_id\": \"qui\",
    \"company_id\": \"nobis\",
    \"description\": \"Veritatis cum aut voluptas.\",
    \"account_number\": \"dg\"
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/cashBox/15"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

    "name": "الخزنة الفرعية",
    "balance": 27,
    "cash_box_type_id": "fugit",
    "is_default": true,
    "user_id": "qui",
    "company_id": "nobis",
    "description": "Veritatis cum aut voluptas.",
    "account_number": "dg"
};

    method: "PUT",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());

Request      

PUT api/cashBox/{cashBox_id}

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

cashBox_id   integer   

The ID of the cashBox. Example: 15

cashBox   string   

معرف الخزنة. Example: 1

Body Parameters

name   string  optional  

اسم الخزنة المحدث. Example: الخزنة الفرعية

balance   number  optional  

Must be at least 0. Example: 27

cash_box_type_id   string   

The id of an existing record in the cash_box_types table. Example: fugit

is_default   boolean  optional  

Example: true

user_id   string   

The id of an existing record in the users table. Example: qui

created_by   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the users table.

company_id   string   

The id of an existing record in the companies table. Example: nobis

description   string  optional  

Must not be greater than 255 characters. Example: Veritatis cum aut voluptas.

account_number   string  optional  

Must not be greater than 255 characters. Example: dg

    "http://localhost/api/cashBox/transfer" \

    \"cash_box_id\": 1,
    \"to_cash_box_id\": 2,

    \"description\": \"تحويل عهدة شهرية\"
}"

Request      

POST api/cashBox/transfer

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

amount   number   

المبلغ المراد تحويله. Example: 500.5

cash_box_id   integer   

معرف الخزنة المصدر. Example: 1

to_cash_box_id   integer   

معرف الخزنة الهدف. Example: 2

to_user_id   integer   

معرف المستخدم المستلم (يمكن أن يكون نفس المحول). Example: 1

description   string  optional  

وصف التحويل. Example: تحويل عهدة شهرية

عرض قائمة المدفوعات

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/payments?user_id=1&payment_method_id=1&cash_box_id=1&amount_from=100&amount_to=1000&paid_at_from=2023-01-01&per_page=13" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/payments"
);

const params = {
    "user_id": "1",
    "payment_method_id": "1",
    "cash_box_id": "1",
    "amount_from": "100",
    "amount_to": "1000",
    "paid_at_from": "2023-01-01",
    "per_page": "13",
};
Object.keys(params)
    .forEach(key => url.searchParams.append(key, params[key]));

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

            "updated_at": null

Request      

GET api/payments

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Query Parameters

user_id   integer  optional  

فلترة حسب المستخدم. Example: 1

payment_method_id   integer  optional  

فلترة حسب طريقة الدفع. Example: 1

cash_box_id   integer  optional  

فلترة حسب الخزنة. Example: 1

amount_from   number  optional  

المبلغ من. Example: 100

amount_to   number  optional  

المبلغ إلى. Example: 1000

paid_at_from   string  optional  

date تاريخ الدفع من. Example: 2023-01-01

per_page   integer  optional  

عدد النتائج. Default: 20 Example: 13

تسجيل دفعة جديدة

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://localhost/api/payment" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"user_id\": 1,
    \"payment_date\": \"2026-01-01T20:56:00\",
    \"amount\": 1500.75,
    \"method\": \"distinctio\",
    \"notes\": \"دفعة مقدمة من الحساب\",
    \"is_split\": true,
    \"payment_method_id\": 1,
    \"cash_box_id\": 1,
    \"paid_at\": \"2023-05-20 14:30:00\"
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/payment"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "user_id": 1,
    "payment_date": "2026-01-01T20:56:00",
    "amount": 1500.75,
    "method": "distinctio",
    "notes": "دفعة مقدمة من الحساب",
    "is_split": true,
    "payment_method_id": 1,
    "cash_box_id": 1,
    "paid_at": "2023-05-20 14:30:00"
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());

Request failed with error:

Request      

POST api/payment

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

user_id   integer   

معرف العميل/المورد. Example: 1

payment_date   string   

Must be a valid date. Example: 2026-01-01T20:56:00

amount   number   

المبلغ المالي. Example: 1500.75

method   string   

Example: distinctio

notes   string  optional  

ملاحظات إضافية. Example: دفعة مقدمة من الحساب

is_split   boolean   

Example: true

payment_method_id   integer   

معرف طريقة الدفع. Example: 1

cash_box_id   integer   

معرف الخزنة المستلمة/الصادرة. Example: 1

paid_at   datetime  optional  

تاريخ وتوقيت الدفع. Example: 2023-05-20 14:30:00

عرض دفعة محددة if (!$authUser || !$companyId) { return api_unauthorized('يتطلب المصادقة أو الارتباط بالشركة.'); } $payment = Payment::with($this->relations)->findOrFail($id); $canView = false; if ($authUser->hasPermissionTo(perm_key('admin.super'))) { $canView = true; } elseif ($authUser->hasAnyPermission([perm_key('payments.view_all'), perm_key('admin.company')])) { $canView = $payment->belongsToCurrentCompany(); } elseif ($authUser->hasPermissionTo(perm_key('payments.view_children'))) { $canView = $payment->belongsToCurrentCompany() && $payment->createdByUserOrChildren(); } elseif ($authUser->hasPermissionTo(perm_key('payments.view_self'))) { $canView = $payment->belongsToCurrentCompany() && $payment->createdByCurrentUser(); } if ($canView) { return api_success(new PaymentResource($payment), 'تم استرداد الدفعة بنجاح.'); } return api_forbidden('ليس لديك إذن لعرض هذه الدفعة.'); } catch (Throwable $e) { return api_exception($e); } }

Example request:
curl --request PUT \
    "http://localhost/api/payment/20" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"payment_date\": \"2026-01-01T20:56:00\",
    \"amount\": 2000,
    \"method\": \"inventore\",
    \"notes\": \"illo\",
    \"is_split\": true
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/payment/20"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "payment_date": "2026-01-01T20:56:00",
    "amount": 2000,
    "method": "inventore",
    "notes": "illo",
    "is_split": true
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "PUT",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

PUT api/payment/{payment}

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

payment   integer   

The payment. Example: 20

id   string   

معرف الدفعة. Example: 1

Body Parameters

user_id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the users table.

payment_date   string  optional  

Must be a valid date. Example: 2026-01-01T20:56:00

amount   number  optional  

المبلغ الجديد. Example: 2000

method   string  optional  

Example: inventore

notes   string  optional  

Example: illo

is_split   boolean  optional  

Example: true

payment_method_id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the payment_methods table.

حذف دفعة

Example request:
curl --request DELETE \
    "http://localhost/api/payment/15" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"

    "http://localhost/api/payment/15"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

    method: "DELETE",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

DELETE api/payment/{payment}

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

payment   integer   

The payment. Example: 15

id   string   

معرف الدفعة. Example: 1

عرض طرق الدفع المتاحة استرجاع كافة الوسائل المالية المقبولة في النظام (كاش، تحويل بنكي، محفظة إلكترونية).

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/payment-methods?active=1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/payment-methods"
);

const params = {
    "active": "1",
};
Object.keys(params)
    .forEach(key => url.searchParams.append(key, params[key]));

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (200):


{
    "data": [
        {
            "id": 1,
            "name": "نقدي",
            "description": null,
            "is_active": false,
            "created_at": "2026-01-01 20:54:20",
            "updated_at": "2026-01-01 20:54:20"
        },
        {
            "id": 1,
            "name": "نقدي",
            "description": null,
            "is_active": false,
            "created_at": "2026-01-01 20:54:20",
            "updated_at": "2026-01-01 20:54:20"
        }
    ]
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/payment-methods

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Query Parameters

active   boolean  optional  

فلترة حسب النشط فقط. Example: true

إضافة طريقة دفع

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://localhost/api/payment-method" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"name\": \"فودافون كاش\",
    \"code\": \"VFC\",
    \"active\": true
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/payment-method"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "name": "فودافون كاش",
    "code": "VFC",
    "active": true
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

    "amount_to": "1000",

Accept

المبلغ من. Example: 100

amount_to   number  optional  

المبلغ إلى. Example: 1000

created_at_from   string  optional  

date التاريخ من. Example: 2023-01-01

per_page   integer  optional  

عدد النتائج. Default: 15 Example: 20

تسجيل إيراد جديد

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://localhost/api/revenue" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"source_type\": \"vaapejluhgeyighkn\",
    \"source_id\": 1,
    \"company_id\": 1,
    \"amount\": 500,
    \"paid_amount\": 90,
    \"remaining_amount\": 1,
    \"payment_method\": \"sueolacagbxk\",
    \"note\": \"plknutgaqzpbyeweexx\",
    \"revenue_date\": \"2026-01-01T20:56:01\",
    \"description\": \"مبيعات خدمات فرعية\"
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/revenue"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "source_type": "vaapejluhgeyighkn",
    "source_id": 1,
    "company_id": 1,
    "amount": 500,
    "paid_amount": 90,
    "remaining_amount": 1,
    "payment_method": "sueolacagbxk",
    "note": "plknutgaqzpbyeweexx",
    "revenue_date": "2026-01-01T20:56:01",
    "description": "مبيعات خدمات فرعية"
};

    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),

Request      

POST api/revenue

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

source_type   string   

Must not be greater than 255 characters. Example: vaapejluhgeyighkn

source_id   integer   

Example: 1

user_id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the users table.

created_by   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the users table.

wallet_id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the cash_boxes table.

company_id   integer  optional  

معرف الشركة (للمدراء). Example: 1

amount   number   

المبلغ. Example: 500

paid_amount   number  optional  

Must be at least 0. Example: 90

remaining_amount   number  optional  

Must be at least 0. Example: 1

payment_method   string  optional  

Must not be greater than 255 characters. Example: sueolacagbxk

note   string  optional  

Must not be greater than 255 characters. Example: plknutgaqzpbyeweexx

revenue_date   string   

Must be a valid date. Example: 2026-01-01T20:56:01

description   string   

وصف الإيراد. Example: مبيعات خدمات فرعية

عرض تفاصيل إيراد

    --get "http://localhost/api/revenue/6" \

curl --request POST \
    "http://localhost/api/profit" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"source_type\": \"kaus\",
    \"source_id\": 17,
    \"company_id\": 1,
    \"revenue_amount\": 28,
    \"cost_amount\": 68,
    \"profit_amount\": 89,
    \"note\": \"agdfrypp\",
    \"profit_date\": \"2026-01-01T20:56:01\",
    \"amount\": 150,
    \"description\": \"عمولة مبيعات\"
}"

    "http://localhost/api/profit"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

    "source_type": "kaus",
    "source_id": 17,
    "company_id": 1,
    "revenue_amount": 28,
    "cost_amount": 68,
    "profit_amount": 89,
    "note": "agdfrypp",
    "profit_date": "2026-01-01T20:56:01",
    "amount": 150,
    "description": "عمولة مبيعات"
};

    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());

    --data "{
    \"source_type\": \"wuerknldqlmfgmw\",
    \"source_id\": 11,
    \"company_id\": \"beatae\",
    \"revenue_amount\": 35,
    \"cost_amount\": 23,
    \"profit_amount\": 69,
    \"note\": \"qcymlhzkbjhnid\",
    \"profit_date\": \"2026-01-01T20:56:01\",
    \"amount\": 200
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/profit/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "source_type": "wuerknldqlmfgmw",
    "source_id": 11,
    "company_id": "beatae",
    "revenue_amount": 35,
    "cost_amount": 23,
    "profit_amount": 69,
    "note": "qcymlhzkbjhnid",
    "profit_date": "2026-01-01T20:56:01",
    "amount": 200
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "PUT",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

PUT api/profit/{profit_id}

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

profit_id   integer   

The ID of the profit. Example: 1

profit   string   

معرف الربح. Example: 1

Body Parameters

source_type   string   

Must not be greater than 255 characters. Example: wuerknldqlmfgmw

source_id   integer   

Example: 11

user_id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the users table.

company_id   string   

The id of an existing record in the companies table. Example: beatae

revenue_amount   number   

Must be at least 0. Example: 35

cost_amount   number   

Must be at least 0. Example: 23

profit_amount   number   

Must be at least 0. Example: 69

note   string  optional  

Must not be greater than 255 characters. Example: qcymlhzkbjhnid

profit_date   string   

Must be a valid date. Example: 2026-01-01T20:56:01

amount   number  optional  

المبلغ المحدث. Example: 200

حذف ربح

Example request:
curl --request DELETE \
    "http://localhost/api/profit/delete/16" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/profit/delete/16"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "DELETE",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

DELETE api/profit/delete/{profit_id}

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

profit_id   integer   

The ID of the profit. Example: 16

profit   string   

معرف الربح. Example: 1

07. الإدارة وسجلات النظام

استعراض سجلات النشاط (Activity Log) تتبع عمليات الإنشاء والتعديل والحذف التي يقوم بها المستخدمون على النماذج المختلفة في النظام.

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/activity-logs?user_id=7&subject_type=officia&action=dolor&date_from=consequatur" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"subject_type\": \"at\",
    \"subject_id\": 14,
    \"action\": \"quia\",
    \"date_from\": \"2026-01-01T20:55:59\",
    \"date_to\": \"2056-02-20\",
    \"per_page\": 6
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/activity-logs"
);

const params = {
    "user_id": "7",
    "subject_type": "officia",
    "action": "dolor",
    "date_from": "consequatur",
};
Object.keys(params)
    .forEach(key => url.searchParams.append(key, params[key]));

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "subject_type": "at",
    "subject_id": 14,
    "action": "quia",
    "date_from": "2026-01-01T20:55:59",
    "date_to": "2056-02-20",
    "per_page": 6
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (401):

Show headers 
cache-control: no-cache, private
content-type: application/json
access-control-allow-origin: *
 

{
    "message": "Unauthenticated."
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/activity-logs

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Query Parameters

user_id   integer  optional  

فلترة حسب المستخدم. Example: 7

subject_type   string  optional  

نوع النموذج (مثل Product, Invoice). Example: officia

action   string  optional  

نوع العملية (created, updated, deleted). Example: dolor

date_from   string  optional  

date تاريخ البداية. Example: consequatur

Body Parameters

user_id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the users table.

subject_type   string  optional  

Example: at

subject_id   integer  optional  

Example: 14

action   string  optional  

Example: quia

date_from   string  optional  

Must be a valid date. Example: 2026-01-01T20:55:59

date_to   string  optional  

Must be a valid date. Must be a date after or equal to date_from. Example: 2056-02-20

per_page   integer  optional  

Must be at least 10. Must not be greater than 100. Example: 6

عرض تفاصيل سجل نشاط

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/activity-logs/1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/activity-logs/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (401):

Show headers 
cache-control: no-cache, private
content-type: application/json
access-control-allow-origin: *
 

{
    "message": "Unauthenticated."
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/activity-logs/{id}

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

id   string   

معرف السجل. Example: 1

سجلات نشاط فاتورة محددة

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/activity-logs/invoice/1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/activity-logs/invoice/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (401):

Show headers 
cache-control: no-cache, private
content-type: application/json
access-control-allow-origin: *
 

{
    "message": "Unauthenticated."
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/activity-logs/invoice/{invoiceId}

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

invoiceId   string   

معرف الفاتورة. Example: 1

تصدير سجلات النشاط

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://localhost/api/activity-logs/export" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"date_from\": \"eius\",
    \"date_to\": \"quia\",
    \"format\": \"excel\"
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/activity-logs/export"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "date_from": "eius",
    "date_to": "quia",
    "format": "excel"
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/activity-logs/export

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

date_from   date   

تاريخ البداية. Example: eius

date_to   date   

تاريخ النهاية. Example: quia

format   string  optional  

تنسيق الملف (csv, excel). Example: excel

عرض قائمة المستخدمين

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/users?nickname=magni&phone=maxime&per_page=14" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/users"
);

const params = {
    "nickname": "magni",
    "phone": "maxime",
    "per_page": "14",
};
Object.keys(params)
    .forEach(key => url.searchParams.append(key, params[key]));

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
