Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/users

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Query Parameters

nickname   string  optional  

فلترة حسب اللقب. Example: magni

phone   string  optional  

فلترة حسب الهاتف. Example: maxime

per_page   integer  optional  

عدد النتائج. Example: 14

إضافة مستخدم جديد

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://localhost/api/user" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"phone\": \"sit\",
    \"password\": \"`(_k[SViS#jJIC|U\",
    \"email\": \"stracke.lela@example.net\",
    \"full_name\": \"qfdvbvvnencoxkrkzwmrvnvt\",
    \"nickname\": \"molestiae\",
    \"username\": \"v\",
    \"position\": \"sbftdvnqymhdlrgqtalf\",
    \"settings\": \"[\\\"porro\\\",\\\"consectetur\\\"]\",
    \"last_login_at\": \"2026-01-01T20:55:59\",
    \"email_verified_at\": \"2026-01-01T20:55:59\",
    \"type\": \"accounting\",
    \"balance\": 113.077,
    \"status\": \"inactive\",
    \"customer_type\": \"wholesale\"
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/user"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "phone": "sit",
    "password": "`(_k[SViS#jJIC|U",
    "email": "stracke.lela@example.net",
    "full_name": "qfdvbvvnencoxkrkzwmrvnvt",
    "nickname": "molestiae",
    "username": "v",
    "position": "sbftdvnqymhdlrgqtalf",
    "settings": "[\"porro\",\"consectetur\"]",
    "last_login_at": "2026-01-01T20:55:59",
    "email_verified_at": "2026-01-01T20:55:59",
    "type": "accounting",
    "balance": 113.077,
    "status": "inactive",
    "customer_type": "wholesale"
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/user

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

phone   string   

رقم الهاتف. Example: sit

password   string  optional  

Must be at least 8 characters. Example: `(_k[SViS#jJIC|U

email   string  optional  

Must be a valid email address. Example: stracke.lela@example.net

full_name   string  optional  

Must not be greater than 255 characters. Example: qfdvbvvnencoxkrkzwmrvnvt

nickname   string  optional  

اللقب. Example: molestiae

username   string  optional  

Must not be greater than 255 characters. Example: v

position   string  optional  

Must not be greater than 255 characters. Example: sbftdvnqymhdlrgqtalf

settings   string  optional  

Must be a valid JSON string. Example: ["porro","consectetur"]

last_login_at   string  optional  

Must be a valid date. Example: 2026-01-01T20:55:59

email_verified_at   string  optional  

Must be a valid date. Example: 2026-01-01T20:55:59

type   string  optional  

Example: accounting

Must be one of:
  • system_owner
  • company_owner
  • sales
  • accounting
  • client
  • user
balance   number  optional  

Example: 113.077

images_ids   object  optional  
status   string  optional  

Example: inactive

Must be one of:
  • active
  • inactive
company_id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the companies table.

company_ids   string[]  optional  

The id of an existing record in the companies table.

created_by   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the users table.

customer_type   string  optional  

Example: wholesale

Must be one of:
  • retail
  • wholesale

عرض تفاصيل مستخدم

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/user/1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/user/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Request      

GET api/user/{user_id}

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

user_id   integer   

The ID of the user. Example: 1

user   string   

معرف المستخدم. Example: 1

تحديث بيانات مستخدم

Example request:
curl --request PUT \
    "http://localhost/api/user/1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"email\": \"murray.patricia@example.net\",
    \"full_name\": \"zkltl\",
    \"username\": \"sbnfqtkaoxlqvnzhgfzwnd\",
    \"nickname\": \"vchvzavmmzw\",
    \"phone\": \"gaoa\",
    \"password\": \"\\/YB\'V;\",
    \"position\": \"ml\",
    \"settings\": \"[\\\"velit\\\",\\\"quidem\\\"]\",
    \"balance\": 11762609.43
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/user/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "email": "murray.patricia@example.net",
    "full_name": "zkltl",
    "username": "sbnfqtkaoxlqvnzhgfzwnd",
    "nickname": "vchvzavmmzw",
    "phone": "gaoa",
    "password": "\/YB'V;",
    "position": "ml",
    "settings": "[\"velit\",\"quidem\"]",
    "balance": 11762609.43
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "PUT",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

PUT api/user/{user_id}

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

user_id   integer   

The ID of the user. Example: 1

user   string   

معرف المستخدم. Example: 1

Body Parameters

email   string  optional  

Must be a valid email address. Example: murray.patricia@example.net

full_name   string  optional  

Must not be greater than 255 characters. Example: zkltl

username   string  optional  

Must not be greater than 255 characters. Example: sbnfqtkaoxlqvnzhgfzwnd

nickname   string  optional  

Must not be greater than 255 characters. Example: vchvzavmmzw

phone   string  optional  

Must not be greater than 15 characters. Example: gaoa

password   string  optional  

Must be at least 8 characters. Example: /YB'V;

position   string  optional  

Must not be greater than 255 characters. Example: ml

settings   string  optional  

Must be a valid JSON string. Example: ["velit","quidem"]

last_login_at   string  optional  
email_verified_at   string  optional  
created_by   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the users table.

images_ids   object  optional  
balance   number  optional  

Example: 11762609.43

status   string  optional  
company_id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the companies table.

company_ids   string[]  optional  

The id of an existing record in the companies table.

تغيير الشركة النشطة

Example request:
curl --request PUT \
    "http://localhost/api/change-company/1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"company_id\": 2
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/change-company/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "company_id": 2
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "PUT",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());

عرض قائمة الشركات

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/companys?per_page=7" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/companys"
);

const params = {
    "per_page": "7",
};
Object.keys(params)
    .forEach(key => url.searchParams.append(key, params[key]));

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (401):

Show headers

content-type: application/json
access-control-allow-origin: *

}

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

name   string

description   string  optional  

Example: Enim soluta cumque aut et illo voluptas.

field   string  optional  

Must not be greater than 255 characters. Example: fidbvrevgjmwxzquunkeg

owner_name   string  optional  

Must not be greater than 255 characters. Example: qrdlhwgaovoemdam

address   string  optional  

Must not be greater than 255 characters. Example: sfizdqtwrdlbwbhguymvali

phone   string  optional  

Must not be greater than 15 characters. Example: zoevenbzb

email   string  optional  

Must be a valid email address. Must not be greater than 255 characters. Example: janick.oberbrunner@example.com

created_by   integer  optional  

The id of an existing record in the users table. Example: 14

company_id   integer  optional  

The id of an existing record in the companies table. Example: 16

images_ids   integer[]  optional  

The id of an existing record in the images table.

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/logs?created_at_from=veniam&created_at_to=tenetur" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/logs"
);

const params = {
    "created_at_from": "veniam",
    "created_at_to": "tenetur",
};
Object.keys(params)
    .forEach(key => url.searchParams.append(key, params[key]));

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

date التاريخ إلى. Example: tenetur

التراجع عن عملية (Undo) إمكانية التراجع عن عملية حذف أو تعديل أو إضافة تمت من خلال سجل النشاط لاستعادة الحالة السابقة للبيانات.

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://localhost/api/logs/maiores/undo" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"

    "http://localhost/api/logs/maiores/undo"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

    method: "POST",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/logs/{log}/undo

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

log   string   

The log. Example: maiores

logId   string   

معرف سجل النشاط المراد التراجع عنه. Example: 1

08. إعدادات النظام وتفضيلاته

عرض أنواع المستندات استرجاع أنواع المعاملات المالية المتاحة (فواتير مبيعات، مشتريات، مرتجعات، سندات قبص).

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/invoice-types?context=laboriosam" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/invoice-types"
);

const params = {
    "context": "laboriosam",
};
Object.keys(params)
    .forEach(key => url.searchParams.append(key, params[key]));

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (200):

    "data": [
        {
            "id": 1,

            "context": "sales",

Example request:

    "http://localhost/api/invoice-type" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"name\": \"فاتورة مبيعات ضريبية\",
    \"description\": \"Doloribus rem repudiandae sunt impedit dolor a.\",
    \"code\": \"SALE_TAX\",
    \"context\": \"sale\"
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/invoice-type"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "name": "فاتورة مبيعات ضريبية",
    "description": "Doloribus rem repudiandae sunt impedit dolor a.",
    "code": "SALE_TAX",
    "context": "sale"
};

    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());

    "data": [

            "is_active": null,

            "created_at": null,
            "updated_at": null
        },
        {
            "id": null,
            "name": null,
            "code": null,
            "description": null,
            "company_id": null,
            "price": null,
            "currency": null,
            "duration": null,
            "duration_unit": null,
            "trial_days": null,
            "is_active": null,
            "features": null,
            "max_users": null,
            "max_projects": null,
            "max_storage_mb": null,
            "type": null,
            "icon": null,
            "created_by": null,
            "updated_by": null,
            "created_at": null,
            "updated_at": null
        }
    ]
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept

    --get "http://localhost/api/plans/15" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"

    "http://localhost/api/plans/15"
);

    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

    "message": "Unauthenticated."
}

Request

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

id   integer   

The ID of the plan. Example: 15

09. الأذونات والأمن

عرض قائمة الأدوار استرجاع كافة المجموعات (Roles) المعرفة في النظام (مثل: مدير، بائع، أمين مخزن).

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/roles?company_id=1&name=admin&per_page=-1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/roles"
);

const params = {
    "company_id": "1",
    "name": "admin",
    "per_page": "-1",
};
Object.keys(params)
    .forEach(key => url.searchParams.append(key, params[key]));

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (200):


{
    "data": [
        {
            "id": 1,
            "name": "مدير شركة",
            "guard_name": "web",
            "created_at": "2026-01-01 20:54:19",
            "updated_at": "2026-01-01 20:54:19"
        },
        {
            "id": 1,
            "name": "مدير شركة",
            "guard_name": "web",
            "created_at": "2026-01-01 20:54:19",
            "updated_at": "2026-01-01 20:54:19"
        }
    ]
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/roles

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Query Parameters

company_id   integer  optional  

فلترة حسب الشركة. Example: 1

name   string  optional  

البحث باسم الدور. Example: admin

per_page   integer  optional  

عدد العناصر. Default: 10. Example: -1

استعراض مفاتيح الصلاحيات جلب جميع تعريفات الصلاحيات المتاحة في النظام من ملف الإعدادات.

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/permissions" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"

    "http://localhost/api/permissions"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (401):

Show headers 
cache-control: no-cache, private
content-type: application/json
access-control-allow-origin: *
 

{
    "message": "Unauthenticated."
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:

If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

تصحيح السجلات المفقودة للخزن الافتراضية

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/fix-missing-default-cashboxes" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/fix-missing-default-cashboxes"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (200):

Show headers 
cache-control: no-cache, private
content-type: application/json
access-control-allow-origin: *
 

{
    "status": "success",
    "message": "تمت عملية تصحيح السجلات القديمة بنجاح.",
    "boxes_created": 1,
    "note": "يرجى العلم أن هذا المسار مخفي من التوثيق ولأغراض الصيانة فقط."
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Get activities for a specific subject

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/activity-logs/subject/logs" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"subject_type\": \"doloremque\",
    \"subject_id\": 11
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/activity-logs/subject/logs"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "subject_type": "doloremque",
    "subject_id": 11
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (401):

Show headers 
cache-control: no-cache, private
content-type: application/json
access-control-allow-origin: *
 

{
    "message": "Unauthenticated."
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/activity-logs/subject/logs

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

subject_type   string   

Example: doloremque

subject_id   integer   

Example: 11

Accept

URL Parameters

Example: 1

تحديث قيمة سمة.

Example request:
curl --request PUT \
    "http://localhost/api/attribute-value/1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"name\": \"crrd\",
    \"color\": \"jt\",
    \"attribute_id\": \"architecto\"
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/attribute-value/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "name": "crrd",
    "color": "jt",
    "attribute_id": "architecto"
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "PUT",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

PUT api/attribute-value/{attributeValue}

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

attributeValue   integer   

Example: 1

Body Parameters

name   string   

Must not be greater than 255 characters. Example: crrd

color   string  optional  

Must not be greater than 255 characters. Example: jt

attribute_id   string   

The id of an existing record in the attributes table. Example: architecto

created_by   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the users table.

    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"

    "http://localhost/api/attribute-value/1"
);

    headers,

تحديث نوع فاتورة محدد.

Example request:
curl --request PUT \
    "http://localhost/api/invoice-type/1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"name\": \"jcrmhbssonygcvjcgidnim\",
    \"description\": \"Architecto fugit deleniti dolorem vitae consequatur est voluptatum dolor.\",
    \"code\": \"pa\",
    \"context\": \"rsyanvqdw\"
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/invoice-type/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "name": "jcrmhbssonygcvjcgidnim",
    "description": "Architecto fugit deleniti dolorem vitae consequatur est voluptatum dolor.",
    "code": "pa",
    "context": "rsyanvqdw"
};

    method: "PUT",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());

Request failed with error:

If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

PUT api/invoice-type/{invoiceType}

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

invoiceType   integer   

Example: 1

Body Parameters

name   string  optional  

Must not be greater than 255 characters. Example: jcrmhbssonygcvjcgidnim

description   string  optional  

Example: Architecto fugit deleniti dolorem vitae consequatur est voluptatum dolor.

code   string  optional  

Must not be greater than 100 characters. Example: pa

context   string  optional  

Must not be greater than 100 characters. Example: rsyanvqdw

حذف نوع فاتورة محدد.

Example request:
curl --request DELETE \
    "http://localhost/api/invoice-type/1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"

    "http://localhost/api/invoice-type/1"
);

    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

    method: "DELETE",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Request      

DELETE api/invoice-type/{invoiceType}

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

invoiceType   integer   

Example: 1

تخزين عنصر فاتورة جديد.

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://localhost/api/invoice-item" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"invoice_id\": \"exercitationem\",
    \"name\": \"est\",
    \"quantity\": 49,
    \"unit_price\": 50,
    \"discount\": 72,
    \"total\": 40
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/invoice-item"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "invoice_id": "exercitationem",
    "name": "est",
    "quantity": 49,
    "unit_price": 50,
    "discount": 72,
    "total": 40
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/invoice-item

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

invoice_id   string   

The id of an existing record in the invoices table. Example: exercitationem

name   string   

Example: est

quantity   integer   

Must be at least 1. Example: 49

unit_price   number   

Must be at least 0. Example: 50

discount   number  optional  

Must be at least 0. Example: 72

total   number   

Must be at least 0. Example: 40

product_id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the products table.

    \"remaining\": 58

Accept

due_date   string   

Must be a valid date. Example: 2026-01-01T20:56:01

amount   number   

Must be at least 0. Example: 76

status   string   

Example: eligendi

paid_at   string  optional  

Must be a valid date. Example: 2026-01-01T20:56:01

remaining   number  optional  

Must be at least 0. Example: 58

تخزين خطة جديدة.

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://localhost/api/plans" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"name\": \"jtizxwjcaeby\",
    \"code\": \"yubpikpcgko\",
    \"description\": \"Quidem quo vitae ipsum labore amet.\",
    \"price\": 71,
    \"currency\": \"mi\",
    \"duration\": 39,
    \"duration_unit\": \"urnefzadrjabziqsco\",
    \"trial_days\": 32,
    \"is_active\": false,
    \"features\": \"[\\\"sed\\\",\\\"ut\\\"]\",
    \"max_users\": 57,
    \"max_projects\": 81,
    \"max_storage_mb\": 41,
    \"type\": \"svkuigcrldma\",
    \"icon\": \"tqzom\"
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/plans"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "name": "jtizxwjcaeby",
    "code": "yubpikpcgko",
    "description": "Quidem quo vitae ipsum labore amet.",
    "price": 71,
    "currency": "mi",
    "duration": 39,
    "duration_unit": "urnefzadrjabziqsco",
    "trial_days": 32,
    "is_active": false,
    "features": "[\"sed\",\"ut\"]",
    "max_users": 57,
    "max_projects": 81,
    "max_storage_mb": 41,
    "type": "svkuigcrldma",
    "icon": "tqzom"
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/plans

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

name   string   

Must not be greater than 255 characters. Example: jtizxwjcaeby

code   string  optional  

Must not be greater than 255 characters. Example: yubpikpcgko

description   string  optional  

Example: Quidem quo vitae ipsum labore amet.

company_id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the companies table.

price   number  optional  

Must be at least 0. Example: 71

currency   string  optional  

Must not be greater than 10 characters. Example: mi

duration   integer  optional  

Must be at least 1. Example: 39

duration_unit   string  optional  

Must not be greater than 20 characters. Example: urnefzadrjabziqsco

trial_days   integer  optional  

Must be at least 0. Example: 32

is_active   boolean  optional  

Example: false

features   string  optional  

Must be a valid JSON string. Example: ["sed","ut"]

max_users   integer  optional  

Must be at least 0. Example: 57

max_projects   integer  optional  

Must be at least 0. Example: 81

max_storage_mb   integer  optional  

Must be at least 0. Example: 41

type   string  optional  

Must not be greater than 50 characters. Example: svkuigcrldma

icon   string  optional  

Must not be greater than 255 characters. Example: tqzom

تحديث خطة محددة.

Example request:
curl --request PUT \
    "http://localhost/api/plans/11" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"name\": \"bkvvgfdgpellmdmmbrr\",
    \"code\": \"ofllfzddkade\",
    \"description\": \"Ea eaque voluptate et totam.\",
    \"price\": 14,
    \"currency\": \"uophcbjaiy\",
    \"duration\": 54,
    \"duration_unit\": \"ybnvgtccrbwzqxb\",
    \"trial_days\": 0,
    \"is_active\": true,
    \"features\": \"[\\\"odit\\\",\\\"consequatur\\\"]\",
    \"max_users\": 68,
    \"max_projects\": 8,
    \"max_storage_mb\": 2,
    \"type\": \"xfstowmyawlcjlprdobcjn\",
    \"icon\": \"vfjp\"
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/plans/11"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "name": "bkvvgfdgpellmdmmbrr",
    "code": "ofllfzddkade",
    "description": "Ea eaque voluptate et totam.",
    "price": 14,
    "currency": "uophcbjaiy",
    "duration": 54,
    "duration_unit": "ybnvgtccrbwzqxb",
    "trial_days": 0,
    "is_active": true,
    "features": "[\"odit\",\"consequatur\"]",
    "max_users": 68,
    "max_projects": 8,
    "max_storage_mb": 2,
    "type": "xfstowmyawlcjlprdobcjn",
    "icon": "vfjp"
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "PUT",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

PUT api/plans/{id}

PATCH api/plans/{id}

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

id   integer   

The ID of the plan. Example: 11

Body Parameters

name   string   

Must not be greater than 255 characters. Example: bkvvgfdgpellmdmmbrr

code   string  optional  

Must not be greater than 255 characters. Example: ofllfzddkade

description   string  optional  

Example: Ea eaque voluptate et totam.

company_id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the companies table.

price   number  optional  

Must be at least 0. Example: 14

currency   string  optional  

Must not be greater than 10 characters. Example: uophcbjaiy

duration   integer  optional  

Must be at least 1. Example: 54

duration_unit   string  optional  

Must not be greater than 20 characters. Example: ybnvgtccrbwzqxb

trial_days   integer  optional  

Must be at least 0. Example: 0

is_active   boolean  optional  

Example: true

features   string  optional  

Must be a valid JSON string. Example: ["odit","consequatur"]

max_users   integer  optional  

Must be at least 0. Example: 68

max_projects   integer  optional  

Must be at least 0. Example: 8

max_storage_mb   integer  optional  

Must be at least 0. Example: 2

type   string  optional  

Must not be greater than 50 characters. Example: xfstowmyawlcjlprdobcjn

icon   string  optional  

Must not be greater than 255 characters. Example: vfjp

حذف خطة محددة.

Example request:
curl --request DELETE \
    "http://localhost/api/plans/4" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/plans/4"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "DELETE",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

id   integer   

The ID of the plan. Example: 4

    --get "http://localhost/api/php/migrateAndSeed" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"

    "http://localhost/api/php/migrateAndSeed"
);

    "Accept": "application/json",
};

    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
